original:
The concept of an exchange economy has been generalized by Mas-Colell. In this framework, for each consumer \( i \), the following components are defined:

- - -   \[
  P_i(y_i) := \{ z_i \in Y_i \mid z_i \succ_i y_i \}
  \]
  It is important to note that the preference relation is not required to be complete or
